name: Nebula
description: Nebula is an action platformer with a high emphasis on using everything at your disposal to succeed, such as the gravity gun. The game takes place on an abandoned space station where you need to survive the deadly traps, defeat your enemies and solve physics based puzzles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 4000M 2.4GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 8750M DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
